backgammon.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • backgammon.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Board. Essentially the board state class Holds all the data on the board, where all the peices are, if the player is in a position to move etc
    Author:
    David Lomas - 11035527
